text: Mount Priestley is a mountain in the Coast Mountains of British Columbia, Canada. Mount Priestly has an elevation and prominence measure of making it one of Canada's many ultra prominent peaks. It was first climbed by Drew Copeland, John Gill and Jordan Craven June 20, 2017. The first ascent was not in 2017 as stated. I, Larry Ciejka and a partner topped out Mt Priestly inseptember of 1983. It was a side trip from another climb. We just did not bother to register or brag abou it. We just did it. ==References== Category:Mountains of British Columbia Category:Coast Mountains
title: Mount Priestley (British Columbia)
